name: Retired Hero Gets Slaves
description:
Multitude of choices - Personalize YOUR story!

  • With over 100 total choice points, immerse yourself in an anime-inspired fantasy world!
  • Would you stay true to what it means to be a hero or do you have enough of this shit?

Several fetishes and positions!

Includes: vaginal and anal sex in a few positions - missionary, cowgirl, from behind, head down ass up; titjob, blowjob, clothed sex.
    For more details please check Mature Content Description section above.

Fantasy world story!

  • Embark on a journey to defeat Demon Lord once more, meet new companions, discover secrets of bloodlines, fulfill prophecy and break chains of fate!
  • Colorful and diverse characters, carefully crafted story and lore bring this epic tale to life!

Several Event CGs!

  • Each of the 7 sex scenes has a few variations depending on your choices or scene progression!
  • See important story points illustrated! Plot-twisting revelations, cute-yet-heartbreaking moments!
